name: acm-compass
description: ACM Compass - 题目与比赛追踪系统 (TypeScript + React + Ant Design)

scripts.dev: concurrently -n server,web -c cyan,magenta --kill-others "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:web"
scripts.build: npm run build:web && npm run build:server
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd web && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
